item.title: *Metallic Watercolours*
item.description: I got these Kuretake watercolours for Christmas and have been too intimidated to play with them. I am not an artist. I am not artistic. I don’t know how to colour. But I do know how to scribble on paper LOL Card Info Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Basic Black; black watercolour paper Dies: MFT Celebrate Tools: Fricken Square Corners Etc: Kuretake Gem Colors Watercolours
